lines: SDAH:590
1. Ri tshi pfa Murena, na ipfi lawe-vho,
U vhonetshela ndila yashu,
Ri tshimbila nae, U dzula na rine,
Na vha pfaho, Vha mu hulisa.
Thetshelesa, U di-tukufhadze,
U fulufhele Yesu, U di-tukufhadze.
2. A ri nyadzi tshithu, Lufunoni lwawe,
Ro di-nekedza tshothe Yesu, Ro funwa nga Iwe,
A ri ofhi tshithu, Tshi bvelelaho ri na Iwe.
3. A huna vhuleme. Naho hu u ofha,
Ri wana malamba mahulu. A hu na tshinyalo,
Naho e mathupho, nga u pfa ri wana mashudu.
4. A ri soli tshithu, lufunoni lwawe,
Ri tshi vhea zwothe kha Ene, U sumba lufuno,
Na lone dakalo, Kha ri mu pfe ri mu hulise.
5. Musi ri tshi pfana, Ri do tuwa rothe,
Yesu u do ri dzhia rothe, Ri do dzula nae,
Ra tshimbila nae, Ra tshidzwa nga hu sa fheliho.
